I build realtime webapps

Hint: you're looking at one. Click the background to change the color. Try it on multiple devices.

by using components like

and moving very, very quickly.

(I also sometimes build backends in node, integrate payments with stripe, measure user behavior with mixpanel, scaffold projects with yeoman, deploy with heroku/dokku, and make pretty bombtastic sandwiches)

Recent projects:

Shortwave is an iBeacon-based anonymous messaging app with a range of about 70 feet.

Generator-realtime is a fork of generator-angular with some extra goodness baked right in.

Valet is a realtime socket.io server in a box. Built at One Mighty Roar

rbn-* (aka Bifrost) is a daemon for the Raspberry Pi that sends Bluetooth LE and Arduino traffic to the web via websockets. Built for the Robin platform.

Wander Pulls vector data (roads, parks, buildings, etc) from Open Street Maps and uses it to builds a tile-based geohashed game map.

I'm for hire.

And I'm always looking for interesting projects.

Let's build something
